definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: These reference books are necessary to us.
sentences.chinese: 这些参考书是我们所必需的。

sentences.english: Is to study the Qing important reference book of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 是研究清诗的重要参考书。

sentences.english: The teacher haa make out a list of reference book.
sentences.chinese: 教师已开出了一份参考书单。

sentences.english: Below are downloadable sets of lecture notes and bibliographical references for readings used in conjunction with lectures.
sentences.chinese: 以下为与本课程相关之可下载的课堂讲稿与参考书目。

sentences.english: The sources have been indicated in the bibliographies of the various chapters.
sentences.chinese: 每章中的参考书目指出资料来源。

sentences.english: Dictionaries and all books in the reference stacks cannot be checked out.
sentences.chinese: 工具书和参考书书库中的所有书都不能外借。

sentences.english: I have turned to all the well-known reference books for help.
sentences.chinese: 我已经查阅过所有著名的参考书以寻求帮助。

sentences.english: A bibliography of recommended reference texts are listed below the table.
sentences.chinese: 在表下还列出推荐参考书目。

sentences.english: Yet, it is a reference book that you will want to read and savor.
sentences.chinese: 的确，这是一本值得您阅读和欣赏的参考书。

sentences.english: A scholastic work is to have a useful bibliography at the end of each chapter or the whole book.
sentences.chinese: 学术著作应该在每一章或全书之后附有一份参考书目。

sentences.english: At the library I came across the old reference Book.
sentences.chinese: 在图书馆里我找到旧参考书。

sentences.english: Last semester, a freshmen asked to borrow some reference books for exams.
sentences.chinese: 上学期，一位大一新生向她借一些考试用的参考书。

sentences.english: Really speaking it is one of the best reference book for studying the Ye's case.
sentences.chinese: 且语言通俗，条理分明，诚为研读叶案较好的参考书。

sentences.english: We should often utilize Sundays to read reference books.
sentences.chinese: 我们应时常利用星期日来阅读参考书。

sentences.english: The bibliography of on one year can be drawn lessons from before recruit students general rules is announced.
sentences.chinese: 招生简章公布前可以借鉴上一年度的参考书目。

definition: reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
reference book consisting of material quoted from many sources, arranged by category (about 600 of which were compiled between the 3rd and 18th centuries in China)
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
Guwen Guanzhi, an anthology of essays written in Literary Chinese, compiled and edited by Wu Chucai and Wu Diaohou of Qing dynasty
variant of 復習|复习[fu4 xi2]
